meanings.sent1: I recompiled my code to fix the errors.
meanings.sent2: She recompiled the report after finding new data.
meanings.sent3: The computer felt proud when it recompiled the program perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts recompiled into a clear plan of action.
meanings.sent5: The artist recompiled the pieces into a beautiful mosaic.

meanings.sent5: The student recompiled the torn pages of his notebook.
